1635500.name: Elements Destiny
1635500.description:
Erika learns this from a mysterious stranger named Airic O 'Fory. He warns her and her future companions of another shadow crusade, an approaching threat that took countless lives in Solitas 24 years ago. Only the descendants of the clans of elements have the power to avert it - Descendants like Erika. And so she embarks on a journey into the unknown, which will lead her through all of Solitas and perhaps even beyond.


Join Erika on her mission! Find all those who have been chosen to walk this path with her and awaken their elemental powers. Not only do they open up unique possibilities in combat, they also help you to overcome various obstacles along the way. Defeat fearsome monsters, treacherous adversaries - and sometimes Erika's own fears.


On their way, Erika, Lia, Maline and Karen meet a variety of different personalities. Anyone could steer the story in a new direction. Which, however, remains to be seen.

Key Features:

  • Over 70 hours of playtime
  • Emotional story with strong focus on characters
  • Professional German dub with over 40 voice actors & actresses
  • Old meets new - Elements Destiny combines the classic pixel look with modern, hand-painted artworks
  • Action-packed turn-based combat
  • Specially composed soundtrack with over 100 tracks
  • Crafting system for weapons, potions, trinkets and more!
1635500.supported_languages:
德语*, 英语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
